items.title: Sources: Cunningham set to become Falcons' GM
items.description: The Falcons hired former Bears assistant general manager Ian Cunningham as their new GM.

items.title: One for ages: Flagg nets 49; Knueppel scores win
items.description: Kon Knueppel made the critical plays down the stretch, outdueling Cooper Flagg, his former roommate at Duke who led all scorers with 49 points, and he...

items.title: Kane passes Modano, sets U.S.-born points mark
items.description: Patrick Kane passed Mike Modano on Thursday night to become the highest-scoring U.S.-born player in NHL history.

items.title: Eagles hire Packers QB coach Mannion as OC
items.description: The Eagles are hiring Packers quarterbacks coach Sean Mannion as their offensive coordinator.

items.title: Vonn crashes, limps off in last pre-Olympics run
